siya ge kare habarala kolen othapu riri berena mas kali parsale .siyath adiya ikman karala ara besam aalle bokkuwath pas karala adiya thiyala yanawath ekkama aahenawalu laga lagama nari mara lathoni thiyana saddaya.welawath ra atayi thihata wage aathilu amuthu hulagak gas abarawagena hamanna gaththalu siyage athe thibba hulu aththath hulan parata nimila giyalu.thithatha kaluwarayi mulupalathama .siyata therenawalu athe thiyana mas kutti nikan helawenawa dagalanawa dagalanawa wage .monawa karannada siyath iwen wage adiyata dekata gewal paththata dan yanawalu dannam adi dahayak wage pitipassen aahenawalu nari udu burna saddaya.miniha eth nemelu mas parsale atha aariye .

ee nisama salliya bage thibunu udawiyata thibunu salakili anith hamotama nothibunu bawa akamaththen uwada kiwa yuththeya üò¶ ekala kanishta krikat puhunuwim bharawa hitiye pa** nohoth thanakolayaya, me hadaya apata kese wethath athapaya diga hara wiyadam karana ammalata saha ee udawiyage daruwan hata dadi karunawak dakwiya üôÇ thanakolayage hasirima, katha baha menma anekuth kudukedukam apa ekalada norissu bawa amuthuwen kiyannata anawashyaya, thanakolaya gana kiyanna thawath katha athath ee dewal pasuwata thabami üôÇ emenma dinakata 50 ‚Äì 80 k dena puhunuwim karana wita pithikaranaya pasakin thabuwath panduwak athata ahuwanneda yalata mahataya, mese kalak pissuwen men puhunuwim sandaha giyath in thrupthimath nowu kanda krikat kridawata thitha thabuweya.

mul pituwa - pradhana amathyanshaya - madhyama palath sabhawa, shri lankawa shri lanka madhyama palath sabhawe pradhana amathyanshaya saha mudal ha krama sampadana, nithiya ha samaya, palath palana ha palath paripalanaya, manawa sampath, adhyapana ha sanskruthika katayuthu, sancharaka, idam, welada ha wanija, aahara sapayum bedaharime katayuthu, aayojana sambandhikarana ha wenath amathyanshayan yatathata noganena wishayayan sambandha amathyansha web adawiya wetha piwisi oba sadarayen piliganimu! 1978 shri lanka prajathanthrika samajawadi janarajaye aandukrama wyawasthawata idiripath karana lada 13 wana aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhanaye 154 " a " waganthiya anuwa palath sabha pihituwa atha.
